thread.title: Wheelchair user creates mannequin to target disabled consumers - BBC News
thread.title_full: Wheelchair user creates mannequin to target disabled consumers - BBC News

title: Wheelchair user creates mannequin to target disabled consumers - BBC News
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Wheelchair user creates mannequin to target disabled consumers 22 February 2017 Last updated at 00:34 GMT 
British businesses could be losing out on a potential £420 million a week by failing to target disabled consumers. 
Sophie Morgan designed the 'Mannequal' – a wheelchair for mannequins that is both a style guide for wheelchair users and a symbol of inclusivity. 
Producer: Laura Westbrook
